1. Getting Started¶

These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project.

1.1. Prerequisites¶

What Prerequisites you need to install the software :

  • Python 3.6.x

  • NumPy Pkg

  • PM4PY Pkg

  • networkx Pkg

1.2. Tools used¶

  • Git

  • PyCharm

  • Google Docs

  • Trello

1.3. Download the code¶

you can download the code from the repository at Anti-Alignment-Repo. The repository contains the source code and testcases.

1.4. Project Documents¶

  • Project Initiation

  • Requirement Engineering

  • Product Backlog

  • First Sprint Planning

1.5. Versioning¶

We use Git for versioning. For the versions available, see the tags on this repository.
